answers.answer: 2 months before so you still have time to get what you need if you don't get it at your shower.
Month & 1/2 to 2 months before. So there's time to do last minute shopping, and able to set up things that need to be done. That's a great time.
I tried to have mine two months before but it had to be rescheduled to almost a month. Next Saturday two months is perfect.
I'm due feb 14 and my shower is scheduled for jan11. Any where between a month and 2 months before due date is good.

I had my shower November 2nd and my due date is Jan 8th but because of gestational hypertension and gestational diabetes I'll be induced 37 weeks exactly.  My shower date was picked before any issues occurred just so we would have time to prepare, wash clothes, and sterilize any products. I am 2 1/2 weeks away from the induction and everything is done! Better to give yourself plenty of time so you don't feel rushed and you can buy those last few items you did not receive.
Ill be having mine when I'm 28 weeks.
Im due Feb 11th and having mine Jan 4th
My baby shower is December 8th. I'm due January 10th. So 1 month in advance. I'd say 1-2 months is perfect!

question: How far along were most of you when you had your baby shower? Is two months before the due date a good time?
title: baby shower?
